subject: Shipment
description_text:
From which country does your products ship from?

Because I live in Greece and if the product is shipped from within in
Europe, I don't have to pay customs.

conversations.body_text: Hi Panagiotis Zeppos,      We ship to France from our German warehouse with no customs duties or other fees. Feel free to shop with confidence.

Hi, I have submitted my order with the order number #SSN3782, and I want
to be sure that it will be shipped to Greece from your German warehouse. Is
this correct?

Στις Σάβ 8 Νοε 2025 στις 1:56 π.μ., ο/η service@simsonn.com <
service@simsonn.com> έγραψε:

> Hi Panagiotis Zeppos,
>
> We ship to France from our German warehouse with no customs duties or
> other fees. Feel free to shop with confidence.
